languages.text: {n}В своем лежбище чудовище приняло последний бой и было умерщвлено. Это оказался жуткий металлический скелетообразный ксенос с одним изумрудным оком. Логово его было камерой, похожей на склеп, а под ней покоилась целая крепость, погребенная в камне. Стены ее были покрыты глифами, схожими со странными рисунками спятивших узников.{/n}

{n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts had been drawing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В своем лежбище чудовище приняло последний бой и было умерщвлено. Это оказался жуткий металлический скелетообразный ксенос с одним изумрудным оком. Логово его было камерой, похожей на склеп, а под ней покоилась целая крепость, погребенная в камне. Стены ее были покрыты глифами, схожими со странными рисунками спятивших узников.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那只怪物最终被逼到了自己的巢穴里，进行了殊死搏斗，但最后还是死在了守卫的手上。那是一只恐怖的异形，躯体由金属骨架构成，还长着一只翠绿色的眼睛。它的巢穴是个墓穴般的房间，房间下面是个完整的石头堡垒，表面写满了象形文字，和那些发疯犯人所画的神秘图案十分相似。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那只怪物最终被逼到了自己的巢穴里，进行了殊死搏斗，但最后还是死在了守卫的手上。那是一只恐怖的异形，有着金属骨架的构成的躯体，还长着一只翠绿色的眼睛。它的巢穴是个墓穴般的房间，房间下面是个完整的石头堡垒，表面写满了象形文字，和那些发疯犯人所画的神秘图案十分相似。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Encerrado en su guarida, el monstruo libró su última batalla y fue abatido. Era un xenos aterrador con un cuerpo esquelético metálico y un único ojo esmeralda. Su guarida resultó ser una cámara en forma de cripta, y bajo ella había toda una fortaleza enterrada en piedra. Las paredes estaban cubiertas de glifos similares a los misteriosos patrones que dibujaban los presos locos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Encerrado en su guarida, el monstruo libró su última batalla y fue abatido. Era un xenos aterrador con un cuerpo esquelético metálico y un único ojo esmeralda. Su guarida resultó ser una cámara en forma de cripta, y bajo ella había toda una fortaleza enterrada en piedra. Las paredes estaban cubiertas de glifos similares a los misteriosos patrones que dibujaban los presos locos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}巣穴に追い詰められた怪物は最後の戦いを挑み、殺された。その怪物は、金属製の骸骨のような体とエメラルドの目を持つ恐ろしいゼノだった。その隠れ家は地下室のような部屋で、その下には石に埋もれた完全な要塞があった。部屋の壁は、気が狂った受刑者たちが描いていた謎めいた模様に似たグリフに覆われていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巣穴に追い詰められた怪物は最後の戦いを挑み、殺された。その怪物は、金属製の骸骨のような体とエメラルドの目を持つ恐ろしいゼノだった。その隠れ家は地下室のような部屋で、その下には石に埋もれた完全な要塞があった。部屋の壁は、気が狂った受刑者たちが描いていた謎めいた模様に似たグリフに覆われていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acculé dans sa tanière, le monstre livre une ultime bataille avant de périr. C'était un xénos terrifiant au squelette entièrement métallique, avec une émeraude en guide d'œil. Son repaire s'avère une sorte de crypte sous laquelle une forteresse ensevelie. Les murs sont recouverts de glyphes similaires aux mystérieux motifs que dessinaient les détenus fous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acculé dans sa tanière, le monstre livre une ultime bataille avant de périr. C'était un xénos terrifiant au squelette entièrement métallique, avec une émeraude en guide d'œil. Son repaire s'avère une sorte de crypte sous laquelle une forteresse ensevelie. Les murs sont recouverts de glyphes similaires aux mystérieux motifs que dessinaient les détenus fous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Monster wurde in seinem Versteck in die Enge getrieben. Es kämpfte seine letzte Schlacht und starb. Es war ein grauenhafter Xenos mit einem metallischen Skelett und einem einzigen smaragdgrünen Auge. Sein Versteck erwies sich als gruftähnliche Kammer, und darunter war eine gesamte Festung im Stein vergraben. Die Wände waren mit Glyphen bedeckt. Sie ähnelten den mysteriösen Mustern, die die wahnsinnigen Sträflinge gezeichnet hatten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Monster wurde in seinem Versteck in die Enge getrieben. Es kämpfte seine letzte Schlacht und starb. Es war ein grauenhafter Xenos mit einem metallischen Skelett und einem einzigen smaragdgrünen Auge. Sein Versteck erwies sich als gruftähnliche Kammer, und darunter war eine gesamte Festung im Sterben vergraben. Die Wände waren mit Glyphen bedeckt. Sie ähnelten den mysteriösen Mustern, die die wahnsinnigen Sträflinge gezeichnet hatten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İninde köşeye sıkışan canavar, son savaşını verirken katledildi. Korkunç zenonun metalden iskelete benzer bir vücudu ve yeşimden tek bir gözü vardı. İni mahzene benziyor ve altında taşlara gömülü bir kale yatıyordu. Duvarlarda ise aklını yitirmiş mahkûmların çizdiği esrarengiz desenleri andıran glifler görülebiliyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cornered in its den, the monster fought its final battle and was slain. It was a terrifying xenos with a metallic skeletal body and a single emerald eye. Its lair turned out to be a crypt-like chamber, and beneath it was an entire fortress buried in stone. The walls were covered in glyphs similar to the mysterious patterns that the mad convicts were drawing.{/n}
